thread.section_title: Hotel Eclat Beijing - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Outstanding
thread.title_full: Outstanding - Review of Hotel Eclat Beijing, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: Juan Camilo S
title: Outstanding
text:
This hotel is a museum full of surprises with all types of art, different themes on each floor, rooms with movie themes with magnificent details that will blow your mind away. They could improve on breakfast but anyhow the amenities and details put into this hotel make a true 5 star.
Room Tip: If you are a fan of harry potter or Star wars believe me it is worth the money, the suites have some... See more room tips
